thread.title_full: Man dead, 3 men in custody following shooting in Abbotsford - BC | Globalnews.ca

author: Amy Judd
title: Man dead, 3 men in custody following shooting in Abbotsford - BC | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 20, 2017 1:59 pm Updated: February 21, 2017 12:50 am Man dead, 3 men in custody following shooting in Abbotsford By Amy Judd Online News Producer Global News 
WATCH: A gang war in the Townline Hill area of Abbotsford appears to have flared up again, with a deadly shooting and police chase that ended with arrests. What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
A man has been killed in a shooting in Abbotsford. 
Few details are available at this time but police say they have three men in custody. 
The shooting took place in the 30500-block of Steelhead Court. Const. Ian MacDonald with the Abbotsford Police says they received multiple 911 calls around 9:40 a.m. 
The victim is believed to be a man in his 20s. 
Police say they spotted a vehicle leaving the area after the shooting and used a spike belt to disable it near Mission, with the assistance of Mission RCMP. 
The scene in Abbotsford. Credit: Shane MacKichan 
The car that was stopped in Mission. Credit: Shane MacKichan 
Steelhead Court is in the area of Abbotsford known as Townline Hill , where there has been an ongoing conflict between rival gangs. 
More to come.
